alert.note: Alert for Colleton; Dorchester (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 10 at 5:28PM EST until November 10 at 5:45PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EST FOR PORTIONS OF COLLETON AND DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 528 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Givhans Ferry State Park, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include: Saint George, Givhans Ferry State Park, Givhans and Canadys. This warning includes I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 65 and 68. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes from tropical storms or hurricanes can form and move very quickly. TAKE COVER IMMEDIATELY! If you wait until you hear a tornado it could be too late. Take action now to immediately protect yourself.
